acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Core daemon modules compile in new crate
- [ ] Compatibility re-exports keep downstream builds green
- [ ] No cyclic deps introduced
description:
**Problem**
Daemon ownership is split between old paths and target crate paths.
design: Relocate daemon modules into `beads-daemon` while keeping short-term compatibility re-exports in `beads-rs`.
title: Move daemon modules into beads-daemon with compatibility re-exports
